data.heading: Create must click landing pages
data.text: With Mailchimp's landing page builder, it takes just a few minutes to design beautiful landing pages that make visitors want to join your audience or buy your stuff.

data.heading: Your landing page starts with the right domain. Claim yours today
data.text: Start with a custom domain and get your business online now. Bring your free website and landing pages under one domain to keep your brand in harmony.

data.heading: Landing page templates that work hard for you

dropdownData.title: Create a buzz for your new business
dropdownData.text: Test out your products, messaging, and ideas before you launch, so you can find your future customers, optimize your conversion rates, and get people excited about your brand.

dropdownData.title: Highlight products
dropdownData.text: Our landing page builder pulls product imagery directly from your connected ecommerce store so you can feature a top seller or promote your latest collection.

dropdownData.title: Offer a free download
dropdownData.text: Grow your Mailchimp audience by offering a special download to new contacts.

dropdownData.title: Hold a contest
dropdownData.text: Run your own giveaway to collect email addresses and turn potential customers into loyal ones.
